content: 2 turn half_double_crochet x7 5 chain 1 turn slip_stitch x2 half_double_crochet x5 6 chain 2 turn half_double_crochet x5 - fo using the tail sew the two short sides together then weave in that end take the beginning tail and first weave it in and out over the top of the fin pulling it to gather it just enough to fit the 11 stitches across the bottom of the bag then sew the fin to the bottom of the bag tie off and weave in the end make a chain of 60 then weave it through the double_crochet s at the top of the bag what i like to do is add large beads mine are 20mm wood beads one bead over both strands then one on each strand tie a large knot at the end of each strand to hold the beads on you can also use ribbon string shoelaces etc instead of the crochet chain buttons also will work in place of the beads
